allow:
Bash(.venvScriptspython.exe -c "
from cryptography.hazmat.primitives import serialization
from cryptography.hazmat.primitives.asymmetric import rsa

# RSA 2048bit鍵ペアを生成
private_key = rsa.generate_private_key\(public_exponent=65537, key_size=2048\)

# 秘密鍵（サーバー用）
private_pem = private_key.private_bytes\(
    encoding=serialization.Encoding.PEM,
    format=serialization.PrivateFormat.PKCS8,
    encryption_algorithm=serialization.NoEncryption\(\)
\).decode\(''utf-8''\)

# 公開鍵（クライアント用）
public_pem = private_key.public_key\(\).public_bytes\(
    encoding=serialization.Encoding.PEM,
    format=serialization.PublicFormat.SubjectPublicKeyInfo
\).decode\(''utf-8''\)

print\(''=== 秘密鍵 \(サーバーのVercel環境変数に設定\) ===''\)
print\(private_pem\)
print\(''=== 公開鍵 \(クライアントに埋め込む\) ===''\)
print\(public_pem\)
")

Bash(C:UsersAsakuraDocuments.Python_proj.venvScriptspython.exe -c "from cryptography.hazmat.primitives import serialization; from cryptography.hazmat.primitives.asymmetric import rsa; private_key = rsa.generate_private_key\(public_exponent=65537, key_size=2048\); private_pem = private_key.private_bytes\(encoding=serialization.Encoding.PEM, format=serialization.PrivateFormat.PKCS8, encryption_algorithm=serialization.NoEncryption\(\)\).decode\(''utf-8''\); public_pem = private_key.public_key\(\).public_bytes\(encoding=serialization.Encoding.PEM, format=serialization.PublicFormat.SubjectPublicKeyInfo\).decode\(''utf-8''\); print\(''=== PRIVATE KEY \(Vercel\) ===''\); print\(private_pem\); print\(''=== PUBLIC KEY \(Client\) ===''\); print\(public_pem\)")
